display_long_description:
Virtual Trials Remake – The Ultimate VR Survival Challenge

Virtual Trials Remake is a fast-paced, multiplayer VR experience inspired by Squid Game and rebuilt from the ground up for Meta Quest 2, 3, and 3S. Face off against up to 40 players in intense, high-stakes games where only the strongest survive.
Compete in iconic trials like:

Red Light, Green Light – Freeze or be eliminated.


Dalgona – Carve the perfect shape with precision.


Tug of War – Team strength tested in a brutal pull.


Glass Bridge – Choose the right step—or fall.


Squid Game – The final strategic showdown.


Customize your look with cosmetics and bundles in the in-game store. With improved graphics, smooth VR controls, and regular updates, Virtual Trials Remake offers an immersive, chaotic, and thrilling VR battle for survival.
Will you be the last one standing?
